body.name: ADORNEVE Queen Bed Frame with LED Lights Headboard, Metal Platform Bed with Outlets and USB Ports, LED Bed Frame with Storage Headboard, No Box Spring Needed, Easy Assembly, Vintage Brown
features: 【Indystrial Style and Stylish 】-The perfect combination of metal and wood makes this bed both sturdy and beautiful, the wood planks are MDF wood, Attached with Led Light , This Metal bed is the perfect match for your interior, whether industrial rustic or contemporary, Very suitable for your house style.

【LED Bed Frame】-The Metal Bed with multifunctional LED light strips ,beautiful Multi-colour RGB LED Light(There are over 60000 colors to choose from),Phone App +Remote Control multiple control modes. You can freely set the brightness,color,mode and timing function,and design your light show to your heart's content. with RGB LED Lights Beds Makes Your Life Smarter，more suitable for your needs.

【Storage Headboard with Charging Station】 -Built in 2 Standard Plug Outlets & 2 USB Ports , Which is very convenient for you to charge your phones within easy reach or use a book light to read easily when you are lying on the bed.This bookcase storage headboard has 5 storage compartments and shelves, can be placed easily books, decorations, or some odds, providing you more storage space, It is very convenient and practical.

【Durability & Stable】-Made of sturdy metal bed frame structure,13 heavy-duty metal slats are closely arranged,11 support legs(middle 3 legs are height adjustable), to provide strong support for various types of mattresses, with a load capacity of 1100lbs and allow air to flow freely under the bed. It keeps your mattress fresh without the need for box spring. high-quality hardware ensures bed frame stability and no noise, sleep with peace of mind.

【Easy Installation】-All the parts are delivered to your home in 1 box. Each part of the platform bed is clearly labeled and numbered; installation can be easily done by 1 person with clear instructions.Bed Size: 86.8" * 60.3" * 39.5".

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 12, 2023
reviews.reviewText: It looks great, and I was surprised by the quality. I like that it uses metal slates and not wood like the other frames I’ve bought.The only thing I can say is the building process was a little difficult because I did it alone, with another set of hands it would be no problem at all. I was a little disappointed that the lights need to be plugged in and isn’t a part of the plug assembly that powers the outlets, you’ll have to route the light strip yourself.I had no missing parts or damage to the frame, the box was beat up, but it was packaged pretty well.Overall I’m happy with the purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewText: i’ve seen so many comments says it’s hard to put it together. but it’s really not. i got the queen size and i have short ass arms and i did it myself. now would it be easier if someone helped? of course it would, but i managed. the directions explain everything perfectly. i only messed up 1 time and it was a simple fix.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Sorry, but badly placed outlet
reviews.reviewText: The bed is solid and sturdy, and doesn't make much noise when you move around. It's a little low to the ground, but I knew that from the specifications and I don't really mind. There's still enough for sliding storage to fit under the bed.The only complaint I have is the outlet. I like that there is one built into the headboard, but since it's inside the cubby and not on the top there's nowhere for the wires to go but into the bed. It's hard to tuck them out of the way, and I'm constantly laying on wires, yanking things off of the headboard onto my face while I'm sleeping, and pulling on the cords to the point where it damages my chargers. The outlet is also extremely tight and it's hard to get things in and out. I plugged in two chargers and I don't unplug them because I can't be bothered.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: We didn’t know what to expect based on the price but this is solid and will last for a while for our teen. It’s timely to assemble but worth it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Surprised by the quality

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice once together
reviews.reviewText: One of the pieces is welded together wrong. We had to fix it. Otherwise it is nice

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Box was beat up when it came but everything inside was ok. The instructions could have been a little better but we got it done. It’s a very nice bed for your money. I do have to say if you’re in your 60’s like us get someone younger to help you.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars It’s not built good
reviews.reviewText: Mine came in damaged and I thought oh well, it’ll be fine, I love the way it looks. not 3 months later all the bars and frame have broke or stripped out but now it’s “too late for a refund” I only had it for 4 months” do not buy.
